alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Holt; Wheeler (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:52AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Garfield, Holt and Wheeler Counties through 345 AM CDT... At 251 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lynch to 9 miles southeast of Atkinson to 11 miles east of Rose. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`neill, O`Neill, Ewing, Chambers, Page, Bartlett, Ericson, Amelia, Inman, Emmet, Knievels Corner, Buffalo Flats, Scottville, Sunfish Lake, Cumminsville, Four Corners, Opportunity, Goose Lake State Wildlife Management Area and Gables. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 295 and 328. Highway 281 between mile markers 134 and 199. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
